[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://happybirthday.keepsake.id/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2022/09/laura-adai-yDAT2YMc85Q-unsplash-scaled.jpg” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Montserrat|900||on|||||” text_text_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.05)” text_font_size=”10vw” text_line_height=”1em” custom_margin=”|-24vw|-4vw||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

crossword

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”b886609f-b99a-4e74-b4fc-022c9c2d283c” text_font=”Montserrat||||||||” header_font_size=”5vw” global_colors_info=”{}”]

solve this puzzle!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

hi baby! welcome to the game side of this web!

to add more spice, i put the questions on a crossword puzzle.

hope you enjoy the game and every moment that these answers have will grow bigger in us<3

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_code][et_pb_text module_class=”et_pb_text_inner” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ link_text_color=”#000000″ link_option_url=”#” global_colors_info=”{}”]

if you’re done playing the game and get all the answers correct, take a screenshot and send it to me<3

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://wa.me/6282333502939?text=baby%20i%20got%20all%20the%20answers%20correct!” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”send proof” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.20.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”17px” button_text_color=”#000000″ button_bg_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.05)” button_border_width=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”0px” button_font=”Montserrat|600|||||||” custom_margin=”||||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_button][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.20.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
